rules_text: Create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is two plus the number of cards named Wandering Souls in your graveyard. Conjure three cards named Wandering Souls and shuffle them into your main library.
flavor_text:
[i]“The Reaper went walking, ignoring her duties, letting people see what life was like without her.”
—Azamir, “A New Reaper”[/i]
notes:
!script "<s><l>Conjure three Wandering Souls</l><f>/spawnx3 Wandering Souls Reminder 101</f></s><s><l>Spawn two Spirits</l><f>/spawnx2 1/1 white Spirit 101</f></s><s><l>Spawn three Spirits</l><f>/spawnx3 1/1 white Spirit 101</f></s>","r"
 !token Wandering Souls Reminder<3><conjure>
